mapper.insert: insert into ecs_validate_record (record_key, record_type, last_send_time, expired_time, create_time, record_code, ext_info) values (#{recordKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastSendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expiredTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{extInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_validate_record set record_type = #{recordType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_send_time = #{lastSendTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expired_time = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_code = #{recordCode,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ext_info = #{extInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where record_key = #{recordKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select record_key, record_type, last_send_time, expired_time, create_time, record_code, ext_info from ecs_validate_record where record_key = #{recordKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select record_key, record_type, last_send_time, expired_time, create_time, record_code, ext_info from ecs_validate_record
